Interface ProcessLauncher.PrepareLaunchContext

  • Enclosing interface:
    ProcessLauncher<T extends ResourceCapability>

    public static interface ProcessLauncher.PrepareLaunchContext
    For setting up the launcher.

      Adds a key value pair to the container environment.

      Adds list of files to be localized for the container.
